scripts.build: npm run compile-markdown-loader && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack -p
scripts.publish-docs: npm run clean && git clone git@github.com:skbkontur/react-ui-validations.git dist && cd dist && git checkout gh-pages && cd .. && npm run build && cd dist && git add . && git commit --allow-empty -am "$TRAVIS_TAG" && git push git@github.com:skbkontur/react-ui-validations.git gh-pages && cd ..
scripts.publish-docs-update: npm run clean && git clone git@github.com:skbkontur/react-ui-validations.git dist && cd dist && git checkout gh-pages && cd .. && npm run build && cd dist && git add . && git commit --allow-empty -am "update docs" && git push git@github.com:skbkontur/react-ui-validations.git gh-pages && cd ..
